alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:13AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CDT... At 1212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Silver Bay, to 9 miles northeast of Island Lake, to 6 miles northwest of Boulder Lake, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Two Harbors, Silver Bay, Beaver Bay, Boulder Lake, Castle Danger, Knife River, Devils Island, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Larsmont, Highland Lake, Split Rock Lighthouse, Stoney Point, French River, Island Lake, Alger, Tettegouche State Park, Wales, Palmers, Shaw, and Gooseberry Falls State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
